::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod hears the transmission from the Ark, saying that the bomb had
been deactivated. He activates his comlink.
"Good work." He shoots at some more Preds.
"Hey Hell Beast, you're and Megatron's plan jest failed, the bomb at the
Ark has been disabled! Maximal's, lets clean these Predicon junk heaps
up. FIRE!!!"
Hot Rod launches a rocket, right at Hell Beast's head.
